WordPress Development
Services & Solution

Why Codevian?

Unparalleled Coding Expertise & Innovation

Know More

Clients Catered Globally

Project Delivered

For mobile apps, web apps, website development, and software development

75+

Skilled Developers

Skilled Developers 

Who leverage their years of experience for innovative solutions & quick project delivery. 

A WordPress Development Company Offering 360° Solutions

Businesses that are looking for a WordPress development company frequently have worries about experience, reliability, and scope of services, but we at Codevian take care of these concerns. What distinguishes us is not only our expertise in the latest technologies but also our dedication to understanding your specific business requirements and tailoring a solution accordingly.

Our experienced WordPress developers

are proficient in HTML, JavaScript, PHP, and CSS to create beautiful websites that mix outstanding appearance with unmatched functionality. We don’t simply solve your problems; we also improve your digital presence, optimize your website’s performance, and ensure an appealing user interface.

WooCommerce

Plugin Development

WordPress 6.3.2

Theme Development

SEO Optimized Code

Mobile Responsiveness

WordPress Website Development

We combine innovation, creativity, and strategic thinking to develop a custom website for you. Our team can create feature-rich, responsive websites that reflect the distinctive qualities of your company. From theme selection to precise plugin integration — we make sure that your website not only looks visually appealing but also operates well across devices.

Custom WordPress Development

Whether it’s custom plugin development, theme design, or any other customisation you desire — our Custom WordPress Development service is what you need. Depending upon your unique requirements, we can assemble a special team for you who will delicately work on your project and deliver it within the timeframe.

WordPress Development for Startups

We specialize in WordPress Development for Startups since we understand the particular issues that these businesses encounter. We handle all the aspects of WordPress and online presence, so Startups can focus on their primary business. Our methodology lowers risks, increases ROI, and assists entrepreneurs in standing out in the competitive digital market. Explore IT services for startups

WordPress eCommerce Solutions

We harness the power of adaptable design, smooth payment methods, and optimal product catalogues. We provide personalized solutions that assure effective and user-friendly eCommerce experiences, whether you require a complete online store or just want to integrate WooCommerce into your existing WordPress site.

WordPress Theme Development (UI/UX)

Having expertise in UI/UX designing, our WordPress developers can create amazing WordPress themes that are pixel-perfect and provide robust functionality. They pay close attention to every detail and follow the best UI/UX principles to make the design captivating, resulting in higher CTR and conversion rates.

WordPress Plugin Development

We combine cleverness and technical knowledge to develop customized plugins for your website. Our experienced developers delve deeply into WordPress architecture, leveraging PHP, JavaScript, and CSS to create plugins that improve the operation of your website. We ensure that our plugins also increase user satisfaction by taking an extensive approach to code quality.

WordPress Migration Services

It doesn’t matter what CMS or platform you use, our WordPress developers can help you with an array of migration services like

  • Shopify to WordPress 
  • Migrate Wix to WordPress 
  • migrate Squarespace to WordPress 
  • Joomla to WordPress migration 
  • migrate from Shopify to WordPress 
  • blogger to WordPress migration 
  • migrate Hubspot to WordPress 
  • migrate from Weebly to WordPress 
  • migrate php website to WordPress 
  • migrate craft cms to WordPress 
  • Magento to WordPress migration 
  • migrate web flow to WordPress 
  • Migrate Blogspot to WordPress
  • Sitecore to WordPress migration 

WordPress Integration

With us, you can easily combine the power of WordPress with a variety of apps, taking your website to the next level. Our WordPress team is an API integration expert, ensuring that all of your systems communicate effectively. Whether it’s third-party software or a customized application, we can integrate it into your WordPress website.

WordPress Maintenance and Support

Our promise to excellence doesn’t end after Deployment. We perform weekly updates, making sure your website is protected with the newest themes, plugins, and security patches. We continuously monitor the functionality of your website, taking quick action to fix any issues that arise to keep it running smoothly.

WordPress Development Services 

We are proud of our dynamic WordPress Development team who are dedicated to helping you with your needs.  We can offer innovative WordPress solutions because we are constantly exploring and utilizing the latest tools and technology in the industry.

Can't find the WordPress service you need?

Reach out, and our team will promptly assist you.

Start now

Unique WordPress Solutions We Offer

We offer unique WordPress solutions tailored to elevate your digital presence. Our expert team delivers innovative and scalable solutions that drive engagement and growth.

Start today now
  • WooCommerce Store Development
  • CMS Development
  • WordPress SEO
  • WordPress Multisite Development
  • Custom WordPress CMS Development
  • White Label WordPress Development
  • PSD to WordPress Development

Our WordPress Tech Stack

Although there are thousands of tools and technologies associated with WordPress, our tech stack includes the latest, ensuring your website benefits from cutting-edge solutions.

WordPress versions

  • 0.07 to 6.3.2

Database

  • My SQL

Programming Languages

  • HTML5
  • CSS
  • PHP
  • JavaScript

Libraries & Frameworks

  • jQuery
  • jQuery Masonry
  • Document libraries
  • Genesis
  • Cheery
  • DIvi
  • WPZoom
  • Redux

Plugins

  • Yoast
  • WooCommerce
  • WPform
  • Yoast
  • Elementors
  • Akismet
  • MonsterInsights
  • GoogleForms
  • JetPack

Our Agile Process

Assessing your needs & Brainstorming

Panning & Designing

Development & QA

Launching & Testing

Post-Launch Maintenace & Support

Hire Dedicated WordPress Developers & Complete Your Project Efficiently

Augment your team with our dedicated WordPress developers who can bring new perspectives to the table. With their extensive understanding of WordPress, you can finish your project efficiently and with excellent results.

  • Competent in developing plugins and custom themes.
  • HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP proficiency.
  • Extensive background in building SEO-optimized, responsive websites.
  • Proficiency in improving the performance of websites.
  • Competent in vulnerability analysis and website security.
  • Deep knowledge of database administration.
  • informed about a range of e-commerce systems and page builders.
  • Expert in integrating third-party APIs
  • Excellent Communication skills.
Explore our engagement models

We Follow the Best Coding Standards and Safety Protocols for WordPress Development

Our dedication to quality and best practices is reflected in our strict adherence to the W3C’s web development guidelines. We ensure clean, well-documented, and efficient code that surpasses industry standards. Our development approach emphasizes security, and we go to great lengths to protect your website and data. Our developers adhere to best coding practices.

With us, you can be assured that your WordPress project is in capable hands.

Start today
  • Indentation and Spacing
  • Function and Variable Names
  • Braces and Parentheses
  • Line Length
  • Sanitization and Validation
  • Enqueue Scripts and Styles
  • Internationalization (i18n)
  • Database Interaction

Why We Are the Best WordPress Development Company?

We stand out in offering WordPress development services because we prioritize your digital success over mere websites. We combine technical expertise with a genuine desire to craft WordPress solutions that align with your goals, ensuring your success is paramount in our collaboration.

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 120+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey, President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon, CEO at BullHead City web

This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali , Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian.

Dilip Joshi , Director at Hireseat LLP

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G , CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian’s delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there’s any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution.

Vinay Darp , CEO at XtentTeam LLP

WordPress Development Services FAQS

Have a question? We are here to answer. 

Contact Us

Can you help me develop a custom plugin for my WordPress website?

Yes! Our expert developers can create plugins to match your needs — whether it’s boosting performance, improving user experience, or adding unique features to your website. We’ll collaborate with you carefully to understand your needs and provide a personalized WordPress plugin that properly matches your objectives.

What versions of WordPress are you proficient in?

We specialize in WordPress development across several versions, from older WordPress versions like 0.07 and up to the most recent 6.3, ensuring that we are well-equipped to meet your business requirements.

Is WordPress Right for my business?

Because of its versatility and user-friendly interface, WordPress is an excellent platform for many enterprises. Choose WordPress if you need a dynamic website that is simple to manage & update without requiring a great deal of technical knowledge. 

It’s an excellent option for 

  • Startups
  • Bloggers 
  • Small to medium-sized organizations 
  • Large enterprises  

 

If WordPress does not appear to be the best fit for your unique needs, you can get in touch with us so we can assist you in selecting the right CMS or technology for website development. 

How can I track your developer's progress on our project?

It is simple to keep track of our developers’ progress on your project. We use collaborative project management tools that allow you to track work, and milestones, and receive regular updates. You’ll have real-time visibility into the work being done and will be able to interact directly with our team.

Can I see the design before my website goes live?

Yes, we provide design previews and revisions before the website goes live to ensure that you are completely satisfied with the appearance and feel.

How do you maintain the privacy of the project?

We take many precautions to ensure the confidentiality of your project during WordPress development, such as

  • NDA Agreements: 
  • Limited Access
  • Data Encryption
  • Secure Infrastructure
  • Regular Updates
  • Access Control
